short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you export AnkiPro decks to the real Anki

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you import flashcards from AnkiPro (https://ankipro.net/) to the real Anki (https://apps.ankiweb.net/).
It works as a companion to the Copycat Importer Anki add-on (https://ankiweb.net/shared/info/2072125761).
It's only needed for users that have difficulty logging in to their AnkiPro accounts via the add-on.

## Usage

1. Install the Copycat Importer (https://ankiweb.net/shared/info/2072125761) Anki add-on.
2. Open ankipro.net (https://ankipro.net/) in Chrome and log in to your account.
3. Click on the extension's icon. You should see a message saying "Copied login token".
4. Go to Tools > Copycat Importer > Import from AnkiPro.
5. Paste the login token to the text field.
6. Click Import
